text: I want to express my gratitude for the wonderful environment the school has created for the children. It's clear that a lot of care goes into nurturing the students. The teachers have been incredibly supportive and attentive to the children's needs. They foster a warm, encouraging atmosphere that really helps with the children's development. I’ve noticed how much my child has grown since joining. The support and positive guidance from the teachers have really made a difference.

Kidz Meadow Childcare is an outstanding school that provides a safe, nurturing, and stimulating environment for children to grow and learn. The facilities are thoughtfully designed to support holistic development, offering a balance of academic and play-based activities that encourage creativity, curiosity, and confidence.

The teachers at Kidz Meadow are truly remarkable—warm, dedicated, and highly professional. They genuinely care for the children, creating a positive atmosphere where every child feels valued and supported. With their excellent curriculum and amazing staff, Kidz Meadow is the perfect place for any parent seeking quality childcare and education for their little ones. Highly recommended!

I highly recommend Kidz Meadow! The teachers were caring and patience towards my kids. The teachers also create a supportive earning environment and their passion for teaching is exceptional.  Thank you Kidz Meadow for everything ❤️

Teachers, across all levels, are caring, loving and gentle when handling the children. They also display a positive, cheery outlook when receiving students in the mornings, and send off the students lovingly at dismissal. They would know the names of most, if not all, of the students, creating a healthy bond between students and teachers.
The Nature Magnified curriculum is also interesting and teaches the students to be more respectful and appreciative of nature.

My journey with Kidz Meadow Pasir Ris started in 2021 when I sent my first born there. Now she is on her tail end of her K2 and prepping for her next journey in Pri 1. I’m very thankful for Kidz Meadow as the school not only taught my girls academic bt also helps her in her well being. Through Kidz Meadow, my girl is able to have self confidence and express herself better. Her social skills were honed and she was able to help others when in need.
